George Merschiere

  1. Foster Name: George Eugene
  2. Foster Family: Harry Emmanuel and Anna Marie Thoren Johnson
  3. Location of Family: Harlan City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Alma, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 6/26/1912, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 6/24/2005, Alma, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Frances Johnson
  11. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Kearney Hub (NE), 27 June 2005; Harlan County Journal (Alma, NE), 30 June 2005; Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf, By Train They Came: Fragile Excess Baggage vol. 2 (Denver: Outskirts Press, 2007), 36-37; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1940 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, Stamford Cemetery, Stamford, NE
